thread.title: NRA: GangBangers Walk the Halls – This Woman Knows Her Rights | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: NRA: GangBangers Walk the Halls – This Woman Knows Her Rights | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: NRA: GangBangers Walk the Halls – This Woman Knows Her Rights | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
We’ve seen some very powerful NRA television ads recently. This one speaks to the hundreds of thousands who lose their rights because of their address, the elderly with gang-bangers walking up and down their halls. This woman says she marched behind Martin Luther King, Jr., and she knows her rights.
Sidwell Friends School
NRA: My Rights – Freedom’s Safest Place (Video) If you have time, please vote in my presidential poll, top of this page on your right.
